src:
Golkar Gelar Rapat Pleno Besok Malam Bahas Persiapan Munas
04 Nov 2019, 21:42 by Mochamad Zhacky
Jakarta - Partai Golkar akan menggelar rapat pleno di kantor DPP esok hari. Agenda dalam rapat pleno tersebut yakni persiapan musyawarah nasional (munas).
"Rapat pleno rencananya akan dilaksanakan besok malam. Agendanya tunggal yaitu persiapan pelaksanaan kapan munas, tanggal berapa, tempatnya di mana, panitianya siapa," kata Ketua DPP Golkar Ace Hasan Syadzily di Kompleks MPR/DPR, Senayan, Jakarta, Senin (4/11/2019).
Ace memastikan gelaran munas Golkar akan digelar pada Desember 2019. Untuk tanggalnya, diputuskan dalam rapat pleno esok hari.
"Yang jelas itu akan dilaksanakan pada Bulan Desember. Tapi persoalan tanggal, tempat, akan dilaksanakan pada rapat pleno," jelasnya.
Ace mengungkapkan, puncak rapat pleno Golkar akan digelar di salah satu hotel di Jakarta pada Rabu (6/11). Sehari berselang Golkar akan menggelar rapat pimpinan nasional (rapimnas).
"Lusa melaksanakan puncak di Hotel Sultan, pukul 19.30 WIB. Dan kemungkinan masih dibahas akan dilaksanakan rapimnas Kamis (7/11)," ungkap Ace.

(zak/fdu)
text:
Golkar Holds Plenary Meeting Tomorrow Night Discussing National Conference Preparation
Nov 04 2019, 21:42 by Mochamad Zhacky
Jakarta - The Golkar Party will hold a plenary meeting at the DPP office tomorrow. The agenda in the plenary meeting was the preparation of the national deliberations (munas).
"The plenary meeting is planned to be held tomorrow night. The single agenda is preparation for the implementation of the General Assembly when, what date, where is it, who the committee is," said Golkar DPP Chairman Ace Hasan Syadzily at the MPR / DPR Complex, Senayan, Jakarta, Monday (11/4) / 2019).
Ace confirmed that the Golkar National Conference will be held in December 2019. For the date, it will be decided in a plenary meeting tomorrow.
"What is clear is that it will be carried out in December. But the issue of dates, places, will be held at the plenary meeting," he explained.
Ace revealed, the summit of the Golkar plenary meeting will be held at one of the hotels in Jakarta on Wednesday (6/11). A day later Golkar will hold a national leadership meeting (rapimnas).
"The day after tomorrow will be held at the Sultan's Hotel, at 19.30 WIB.

(zak / fdu)
